title: Be first to live in beautiful Peotone, IL Apt with $8,000 remodeling
posting_body: Check out this completely remodeled apt!
This 990 square-foot apt has just received a $8,000 renovation.

Be the first one to live in this beautiful apt that has new carpeting, wood floors, new bath vanity and sink, new kitchen cabinets with new counter tops, new faucets in kitchen and bathroom, new dishwasher, refrigerator, stove and new air conditioning units.
Bedrooms are very large and include large closets with an abundance of shelves.
New window blinds and all walls will be painted white and rooms trimed with oak colored base and window casing.
Tenants responsible for electricity, natural gas and cable TV.
We do not allow satelite dishes.
We are responsible for sewer, water, garbage collection and all interior and exterior maintenance.
